item.title: Iron Buddha Chinese tea (tie guan yin)
item.description: Iron Buddha (an oolong tea) is the classic Chinese green tea. We've selected a special variety of Iron Buddha for the Min River Tea Farm which has what the Chinese call 'tou suan' - a slightly crisp and tingling aftertaste that refreshes the taste buds and cleans the palette.
item.g:product_type: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: Jasmine Pearls Chinese tea (mo li hua)
item.description: Jasmine Pearls tea (mo li hua long zhu) is a deliciously fragrant green tea scented with the leaves of a jasmine flower. Great for special occasions or guests, your local Chinese probably serves a version of Jasmine tea, but don't be fooled. This Jasmine tea is like nothing you've experienced before.
item.g:product_type: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions

item.title: The Big Red Chinese tea (da hong pao)
item.description: The Big Red (da hong pao) is an earthy and honest red tea. It has a subtle red colour and a rich, nutty and rusty aftertaste. Particularly suited to English tea drinkers, it's great in the mornings or when you need a bit of a kick. If you're used to 'builders tea', then this is a more classy, tasty and healthy substitute.
item.g:product_type: Food, Beverages & Tobacco > Beverages > Tea & Infusions
